metrics.name: topic-creation-metadata-propagation-ms-avg
metrics.description: The average propagation duration in ms of propagating topic creation data and metadata to all brokers in the cluster

metrics.name: topic-creation-metadata-propagation-ms-max
metrics.description: The maximum propagation time in ms of propagating topic creation data and metadata to all brokers in the cluster

metrics.name: topic-deletion-metadata-propagation-ms-avg
metrics.description: The average propagation duration in milliseconds of propagating the topic deletion data and metadata across all the brokers in the cluster.

metrics.name: topic-deletion-metadata-propagation-ms-max
metrics.description: The maximum propagation time in milliseconds of propagating the topic deletion data and metadata across all the brokers in the cluster.

metrics.name: offsets-committed-total
metrics.description: The total number of offsets per second that are committed.

metrics.name: failed-commit-offsets-avg
metrics.description: The average number of offsets per second that have failed.

metrics.name: failed-commit-offsets-total
metrics.description: The total number of offsets per second that have failed.

metrics.name: commit-offset-latency-ms-avg
metrics.description: The average latency in ms of committing offset

metrics.name: commit-offset-latency-ms-max
metrics.description: The maximum latency in ms of committing offset

metrics.name: commit-offset-latency-ms-99th
metrics.description: The 99th percentile latency of committing offset

metrics.name: commit-offset-latency-ms-999th
metrics.description: The 99.9th percentile latency of committing offset

metrics.name: commit-offset-latency-ms-9999th
metrics.description: The 99.99th percentile latency of committing offset

metrics.name: bytes-consumed-rate
metrics.description: The average number of bytes per second that are consumed

metrics.name: consume-error-rate
metrics.description: The average number of errors per second

metrics.name: consume-error-total
metrics.description: The total number of errors

metrics.name: records-consumed-rate
metrics.description: The average number of records per second that are consumed

metrics.name: records-consumed-total
metrics.description: The total number of records that are consumed

metrics.name: records-duplicated-rate
metrics.description: The average number of records per second that are duplicated

metrics.name: records-duplicated-total
metrics.description: The total number of records that are duplicated

metrics.name: records-lost-rate
metrics.description: The average number of records per second that are lost

metrics.name: records-lost-total
metrics.description: The total number of records that are lost

metrics.name: records-delayed-rate
metrics.description: The average number of records per second that are either lost or arrive after maximum allowed latency under SLA

metrics.name: records-delayed-total
metrics.description: The total number of records that are either lost or arrive after maximum allowed latency under SLA

metrics.name: records-delay-ms-avg
metrics.description: The average latency of records from producer to consumer

metrics.name: records-delay-ms-max
metrics.description: The maximum latency of records from producer to consumer

metrics.name: records-delay-ms-99th
metrics.description: The 99th percentile latency of records from producer to consumer

metrics.name: records-delay-ms-999th
metrics.description: The 99.9th percentile latency of records from producer to consumer

metrics.name: records-delay-ms-9999th
metrics.description: The 99.99th percentile latency of records from producer to consumer

metrics.name: consume-availability-avg
metrics.description: The average consume availability

metrics.name: offset-commit-service-success-rate
metrics.description: The success rate of group coordinator accepting consumer offset commit requests.

metrics.name: offset-commit-service-success-total
metrics.description: The total count of group coordinator successfully accepting consumer offset commit requests.

metrics.name: offset-commit-service-failure-rate
metrics.description: The failure rate of group coordinator accepting consumer offset commit requests.

metrics.name: offset-commit-service-failure-total
metrics.description: The total count of group coordinator unsuccessfully receiving consumer offset commit requests.

metrics.name: offset-commit-availability-avg
metrics.description: The average offset commit availability with respect to the group coordinator.

metrics.name: records-produced-rate
metrics.description: The average number of records per second that are produced

metrics.name: records-produced-total
metrics.description: The total number of records that are produced

metrics.name: produce-error-rate
metrics.description: The average number of errors per second

metrics.name: produce-error-total
metrics.description: The total number of errors

metrics.name: produce-delay-ms-avg
metrics.description: The average delay in ms for produce request

metrics.name: produce-delay-ms-max
metrics.description: The maximum delay in ms for produce request

metrics.name: produce-delay-ms-99th
metrics.description: The 99th percentile delay in ms for produce request

metrics.name: produce-delay-ms-999th
metrics.description: The 99.9th percentile delay in ms for produce request

metrics.name: produce-delay-ms-9999th
metrics.description: The 99.99th percentile delay in ms for produce request

metrics.name: produce-availability-avg
metrics.description: The average produce availability

metrics.name: records-produced-rate-partition-*
metrics.description: The average number of records per second that are produced to this * partition

metrics.name: produce-error-rate-partition-*
metrics.description: The average number of errors per second when producing to this * partition
